00042 void PortListView::dragEnterEvent( QDragEnterEvent* event ) {
00043 
00044         // make sure the source is port list view or port maps view and
00045         // that data is correct type
00046         PortListView* source = qobject_cast<PortListView*>(event->source());
00047         PortMapsView* mapSource = qobject_cast<PortMapsView*>(event->source());
00048         
00049         // if source is port list view
00050         if (source && event->mimeData()->hasFormat("text/plain")) {
00051 
00052                 // the item can be removed from the original model
00053                 event->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00054                 event->accept();
00055         }
00056         // if source is port maps view
00057         else if (mapSource && event->mimeData()->hasFormat("text/plain")) {
00058                 event->acceptProposedAction();
00059         }
00060 
00061 }
00062 
00063 void PortListView::dragMoveEvent( QDragMoveEvent* e ) {
00064 
00065         // make sure the data is correct type
00066         PortListView* source = qobject_cast<PortListView*>(e->source());
00067         PortMapsView* mapSource = qobject_cast<PortMapsView*>(e->source());
00068 
00069         // if the source is another port list view then select the item under
00070         // the cursor
00071         if (source && source != this) 
00072                 setCurrentIndex(indexAt(e->pos()));
00073 
00074         if (source && e->mimeData()->hasFormat("text/plain")) {
00075 
00076                 // the item can be removed from the original model
00077                 e->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00078                 e->accept();
00079         }
00080         else if (mapSource && e->mimeData()->hasFormat("text/plain")) {
00081                 e->acceptProposedAction();
00082         }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void PortListView::performDrag() {
00086 
00087         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00088         
00089         QString mimeText;
00090         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00091 
00092                 // if the index is not valid
00093                 if (!index.isValid())
00094                         continue;
00095 
00096                 // add the port name of the indexed item to mime data
00097                 mimeText += index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00098                 mimeText += ";";
00099         }
00100 
00101         // set the mime data
00102         QMimeData* mimeData = new QMimeData();
00103         mimeData->setText(mimeText);
00104 
00105         QDrag* drag = new QDrag(this);
00106         drag->setMimeData(mimeData);
00107         if (drag->exec(Qt::MoveAction) == Qt::MoveAction) {
00108                 
00109                 // inform the model that the dragged items could be removed
00110                 emit removeItems(indexes);
00111         }
00112 
00113 }
00114 
00115 void PortListView::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00116 
00117         // if left mouse button is pressed
00118         if (event->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton) {
00119                 
00120                 // calculate how much mouse was moved
00121                 int distance = (event->pos() - startPos_).manhattanLength();
00122 
00123                 // if the move distance is enough to start the drag
00124                 if (distance >= QApplication::startDragDistance())
00125                         performDrag();
00126         }
00127 }
00128 
00129 void PortListView::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00130 
00131         if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00132                 startPos_ = event->pos();
00133         QListView::mousePressEvent(event);
00134 }

00136 QStringList PortListView::getSelectedPorts(bool remove) {
00137         QStringList portList;
00138         QModelIndexList indexList = selectedIndexes();
00139         
00140         // sort indexes so they are in order
00141         qSort(indexList);
00142 
00143         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexList) {
00144 
00145                 // dont append invalid indexes
00146                 if (!index.isValid())
00147                         continue;
00148                 // append the names of the selected ports
00149                 portList.append(index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString());
00150         }
00151 
00152         // if items are to be removed
00153         if (remove)
00154                 emit removeItems(indexList);
00155 
00156         return portList;
00157 }
